org.TagCloud

Class WordAnalyser

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.TagCloud.WordAnalyser

  • public class WordAnalyser
extends java.lang.Object
    This class does the processing and filtering of the words

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      WordAnalyser(java.util.List<WeightedWordInterface> weightedWords)
      Creates a new WordAnalyzer with the supplied list of WeightedWords.

      Figures out the weight from 0 to 1 based on the supplied color value

    • Constructor Detail

      • WordAnalyser

        public WordAnalyser(java.util.List<WeightedWordInterface> weightedWords)
        Creates a new WordAnalyzer with the supplied list of WeightedWords. Figures out the minimum and maximum values and can calculate the weigth from 0 to 1 for the font weight and color weight.
        Parameters:
        weightedWords - The list of weightedWords

    • Method Detail

      • getWord

        public WeightedWordInterface getWord(int i)
        Returns the word for the index
        Parameters:
        i - the word index, 0 to size() - 1
        Returns:
        the weighted word

      • getWeightedWords

        public java.util.List<WeightedWordInterface> getWeightedWords()
        Returns the list of WeightedWords
        Returns:
        the weighted words

      • getSizeValueSortedTreeSet

        public java.util.TreeSet<java.lang.Integer> getSizeValueSortedTreeSet()
        This method returns a TreeSet of the index numbers of the weightedWords list where the indexes are sorted by the sizeValue of the weighted word. If two values are identical the alphabetically smaller word will come first.
        Returns:
        The TreeSet of index values

      • getMaxSizeValue

        public int getMaxSizeValue()
        Returns the highest value of the size values
        Returns:
        the highest value of the size weights

      • getMinSizeValue

        public int getMinSizeValue()
        Returns the lowest value of the size values
        Returns:
        the lowest value of the size weights

      • getSizeWeight

        public float getSizeWeight(int value)
        Returns the weight from 0 to 1 for a given size value
        Parameters:
        value - the value for which to figure out the weight
        Returns:
        the weight in the range 0..1

      • getTopWordsSizeWeighted

        public java.util.List<WeightedWordInterface> getTopWordsSizeWeighted(int limit)
        Returns an alphabetical List of the the first n words as per the SizeValue order
        Parameters:
        limit - The maximum words to return
        Returns:
        an alphabetical set of the highest ranking n words

      • getColorValueSortedTreeSet

        public java.util.TreeSet<java.lang.Integer> getColorValueSortedTreeSet()
        This method returns a TreeSet of the index numbers of the weightedWords list where the indexes are sorted by the colorValue of the weighted word.
        Returns:
        The TreeSet of index values
